channel.title: OleanPkz - Comes alive in April! - Devo Team Needed!
channel.description:
[center][b]PLEASE NOTE:[/b] This post was directly copied off of our forum's advertisement section. You can visit our forum at: www.OleanPkz.com/Forum
[b]NEW COMMENTS 2/10/12:[/b]
- Killstreak information interface, among with others have been changed.
"The come up" Minigame added. (BETA CLIENT ONLY!) (Management personnel only.)
"End of the Run" Minigame added. (BETA CLIENT ONLY!) (Management personnel only.)
"Stock Exchange" released along with financial statements. (Like moneybag For use of max cash but also used as a max cash trade in a different currency.)
______________________________________________________________________
We have been around since 2009! We have shut down for about two years now perfecting our server and forum and we are almost ready to be back up full time! (24/7 AND SPONSORSHIP on every major site)
We are in need of all new SERVER and FORUM staff. From Assistant's to Co-Owners. (Assist, Mod, Admin, Head Admin, Co Owner)
We are also in need of staff to add to our DEVO Team. This team specializes in the coding, and structure of our Web side, as well as our server and client side. (Such as HTML, Client BUGS, GFX and ANIM personel.
Please comment on here if you would like to be a part of our team. [/center]
_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[center][size=20pt]OleanPkz RSPS and Community forum![/size]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/72ysmt.png[/img] [url=http://www.oleanpkz.com/]Terms and Agreements[/url] - [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/vzbfr6.png[/img] [url=http://www.oleanpkz.com]Site[/url] - [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/9j41t1.jpg[/img] [url=http://www.oleanpkz.com/forum]Forum[/url] - [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/imijbl.png[/img] [url=http://www.OleanPkz.com/]Webclient[/url] - [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/15npw1v.gif[/img] [url=http://OleanPkz.com/forum]Download Client[/url] [/center]
[center] [b]Introduction:[/b] OleanPkz © 2009-2013 - www.OleanPkz.com Owned and created by [url=http://oleanpkz.comyr.com/forum/index.php?action=profile;u=1]Creator Jkas[/url]
Welcome to private server: OleanPkz. We are a 317 DELTA (Yes DELTA, not PI.) player-killing, and skilling server. We specialize in PKing with our custom built player killing system. (View the custom PK system [url=http://oleanpkz.comyr.com/forum/index.php?topic=13.0]here[/url].) We offer over 15 trainable skills and have over 10 bosses, and 7 minigames! You can suggest anything you'd like to see on the forum, or the server by typing ::suggest (In-server.) or by posting your suggestion in the suggestion thread [url=http://oleanpkz.comyr.com/forum/index.php?board=11.0]here[/url]. Suggestions are [u]always[/u] welcome and are read daily by the OleanPkz Management Team. We offer an auto-donation system, as well as a Vote4Point system. (You can view the donation section here, or the Vote4Points system here.) [/center] [right]
Coming soon: - Vote4Points System - High Scores - Webclient Update[/right]
[center][size=18pt]Pictures/Media:[/size] [size=11pt]From the beginning...[/size] [/center]
When you log in for the first time: [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/dzwegx.png[/img]
Accepting the rules: [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/w0gd5e.png[/img]
How to start: (You can type ::skip to skip tutorial island!) [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/29cqs1y.png[/img]
[u]If you finish tutorial island[/u], you get to choose a starter package: [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2vxk21v.png[/img]
Main welcome screen: [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/28ip6qv.png[/img]
Teleport List: [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/24edu0j.png[/img]
Donator Panel: [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2vcz6gi.png[/img]
Super Donator Panel: [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/11tml40.png[/img]
[center] -------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=14pt]Online Point Shop Feature[/size][/center]
Online Point Shop: [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/29fn1k.png[/img]
Online Point Shop - If you click, "Don't show this message again.": [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2vansbs.png[/img]
Online Point Shop - If you click "view shop": [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/24mg8d0.png[/img]
Online Point Shop - If you click "Account Offers": [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/oshjea.png[/img]
Online Point Shop - If you click "Abyssal Whip Exchange": [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2crxcg8.png[/img]
Online Point Shop - If you click "Runes, Arrows, and Food": [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/smenb4.png[/img]
Online Point Shop - If you click "Weapons and Armour": IMG coming soon!
Online Point Shop - If you click "Rare/Special Items": IMG coming soon!
[center] -------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=14pt]PK Point Shop Feature[/size][/center]
PK Point Shop: [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2chawr7.png[/img]
PK Point Shop - If you click "Killstreak Info.": [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/1672uo.png[/img]
PK Point Shop - If you click "Next Page.": [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2s937go.png[/img]
PK Point Shop - If you click "Don't display this message again.": [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/311n9tu.png[/img]
PK Point Shop - If you click "View Shop": [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/mw8ef4.png[/img]
[center] ------------------------------------------------------------------- [/center]
Trial of Judgement Minigame [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/24gopll.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/23uyal4.png[/img]
Talking to the Financial Adviser [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/ebc201.png[/img]
All Godwars Bosses [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2w7lbit.png[/img]
Tormented Demons [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2m2yr01.png[/img]
Assigned Tasks (With rewards!) [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2n9g5zt.png[/img]
More to come..

item.title: OleanPkz - Comes alive in April! - Devo Team Needed!
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

[quote=“KroniKz_, post:9, topic:480843”][quote author=JGX link=topic=599081.msg4214534#msg4214534 date=1360041907]

holy shit I remember seeing this when I first started on this forum O_O

…and that means?
[/quote]
it means hi. how are you? how is life? are you fapping on a daily basis? its good for u, u know! stick that warm dik in yo hand and stroke it like a mothalovea. yey ye homie swag[/quote]

Haha, well said!

Thanks for the bumps!

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

[center]PLEASE NOTE:
This post was directly copied off of our forum’s advertisement section.
You can visit our forum at: www.OleanPkz.com/Forum

NEW COMMENTS 2/10/12:

  • Killstreak information interface, among with others have been changed.

“The come up” Minigame added. (BETA CLIENT ONLY!) (Management personnel only.)

“End of the Run” Minigame added. (BETA CLIENT ONLY!) (Management personnel only.)

“Stock Exchange” released along with financial statements. (Like moneybag For use of max cash but also used as a max cash trade in a different currency.)

We have been around since 2009!
We have shut down for about two years now perfecting our server and forum and we are almost ready to be back up full time! (24/7 AND SPONSORSHIP on every major site)

We are in need of all new SERVER and FORUM staff.
From Assistant’s to Co-Owners. (Assist, Mod, Admin, Head Admin, Co Owner)

We are also in need of staff to add to our DEVO Team. This team specializes in the coding, and structure of our Web side, as well as our server and client side. (Such as HTML, Client BUGS, GFX and ANIM personel.

Please comment on here if you would like to be a part of our team. [/center]

[center][size=20pt]OleanPkz RSPS and Community forum![/size]

Terms and Agreements - Site - Forum - Webclient - Download Client
[/center]

[center]
Introduction:
OleanPkz © 2009-2013 - www.OleanPkz.com
Owned and created by Creator Jkas

Welcome to private server: OleanPkz. We are a 317 DELTA (Yes DELTA, not PI.) player-killing, and skilling server.
We specialize in PKing with our custom built player killing system. (View the custom PK system here.)
We offer over 15 trainable skills and have over 10 bosses, and 7 minigames!
You can suggest anything you’d like to see on the forum, or the server by typing ::suggest (In-server.) or by posting your suggestion in the suggestion thread here.
Suggestions are always welcome and are read daily by the OleanPkz Management Team.
We offer an auto-donation system, as well as a Vote4Point system. (You can view the donation section here, or the Vote4Points system here.)
[/center]
[right]

Coming soon:

  • Vote4Points System
  • High Scores
  • Webclient Update[/right]

[size=11pt]From the beginning…[/size]
[/center]
